commandName.explanation: string handler in help command or something XD
commandName.userPerms: leave empty or don't include if bot doesn't need more than SEND_MESSAGES
commandName.botPerms: leave empty or don't include if bot doesn't need more than SEND_MESSAGES

avatar.explanation: Sends embeded message using Discord.MessageEmbed() method that will contain attachment of your currently selected avatar that you have set some time ago
